alert.note: Alert for Kingfisher (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 11 at 2:39AM CDT until July 11 at 3:45AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 AM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN WASHITA...SOUTHERN KINGFISHER...NORTHWESTERN GRADY...NORTHERN CADDO...SOUTHERN BLAINE AND CANADIAN COUNTIES... At 238 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 4 miles east of Geary to 6 miles east of Hinton to near Binger, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Northwestern Oklahoma City, El Reno, Yukon, Piedmont, Hinton, Union City, Minco, Geary, Okarche, Hydro, Cashion, Binger, Calumet, Eakly, Lookeba, Colony, Bridgeport, Greenfield, Cogar, and Concho. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
